# 1. Data Wrangling

## 1.1 (Q1)
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(Stat2Data)
data("Hawks")
library(dplyr)
hSF <- Hawks %>% filter(Species == "RT" & Weight >= 1000) %>% select(Wing, Weight, Tail)
print(hSF)
head(hSF)

```
## 1.1 (Q2)
```{r}
n_examples <- nrow(hSF)
print(n_examples)
```
## 1.2 (Q1)
```{r}
hSF_sorted <- hSF %>% arrange(Wing)
top_five <- head(hSF_sorted, 5)
print(top_five)
```
## 1.3 (Q1)
```{r}
hawkSpeciesNameCodes <- data.frame(species_code = c("CH", "RT", "SS"), species_name_full = c("Cooper's", "Red-tailed", "Sharp-shinned"))
print(hawkSpeciesNameCodes)
```
## 1.3 (Q2)
```{r}
library(dplyr)
hawksFullName <- Hawks %>% left_join(hawkSpeciesNameCodes, by = c("Species" = "species_code")) %>% select(species_name_full, Wing, Weight) %>% rename(Species = species_name_full)
print(hawksFullName)
```
